ComicInfo.Title: Where Chaos Rules!
ComicInfo.Summary: Where Chaos Rules!: Thor and Mercurio team up to take down Xorr, the God-Jewel. Sif is freed, pleasing Thor. Mercurio is happy that he can harvest the shards of Xorrâ€™s body to provide energy for his imperilled world. Thor steers the Asgardians ship home while embracing Sif.
